Organics/ Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived/ Hellplague/ Sweeps:

 near odimus and Hydras, setting Wolfblade down.  
Wolfblade drew her railg=
un(ooc: I'm assuming that is her weapon since 
she has never used it), and =
Organics drew her shield and sword.
"We're ready, Rodimus," Wolfblade said,=

shoulder.

~*~

ransformed back into robot mode.  He 
knew his presense would cause trouble=

sophisticated sensors tracking everyone's=

tracked the Minions on their approach.

lague transformed into her robot form and signalled one wave of 
Sweeps int=
o battle.  They all transformed and rained down on the 
cannon site, target=
ing everything in sight.  Hellplague laughed, then 
started looking for Rod=
imus Prime.
